class.name: UtilityAIBTRoot
class.brief_description: The main node for the Utility AI Behaviour Tree nodes.
class.description: This is the main node for the Utility AI Behaviour Tree nodes. The root node is ticked to update the state of the behaviour tree.

method.name: tick
method.description: This is the behaviour tree tick-method you should be using to tick the tree. You can provide any [Variant] type as a parameter (usually a node used as an actor or a dictionary used as a blackboard), along with a delta-time. These are passed to all the child nodes of the behaviour tree during ticks.

members.member: This is the total time in microseconds the call to the [method tick] method used.
